column4: guys, I'm experiencing pretty regular complete system freezes on Karmic. even the magic sysrq buttons will not work. I've run memtest for over 24 hours, and it found no errors. What should I look at next?
try passing a few parametrs to kernel on boot like nolapic apic=off and failsafe see if it helps
you can upgrade to a newer or older kernel version, it helped me (both newer and older worked)
no, Linux pdesk 2.6.31-20-generic #58-Ubuntu SMP Fri Mar 12 04:38:19 UTC 2010 x86_64 GNU/Linux
i see, i would recommend installing an older version then, the one of 9.04 works

so you don't have an older kernel to choose from...
